SELECT COUNT( S.seq ) FROM ( SELECT seq AS seq , title AS title , TO_CHAR( reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS regDt , TO_CHAR( mdfcn_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS mdfcnDt , inq_cnt AS inqCnt , use_yn AS useYn FROM g_ntc_brd ) S WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( TO_CHAR( S.regDt, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{ sDate } AND #{ eDate } )
AND S.useYn = #{ useYn }
AND S.title LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' )

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.regDt) AS rowNo , T.* FROM (SELECT S.seq , S.title , S.cn , S.regDt , S.mdfcnDt , S.inqCnt , S.useYn FROM ( SELECT seq AS seq , title AS title , cn AS cn , TO_CHAR( reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS regDt , TO_CHAR( mdfcn_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS mdfcnDt , inq_cnt AS inqCnt , use_yn AS useYn FROM g_ntc_brd ) S WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( TO_CHAR( S.regDt, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) BETWEEN #{ sDate } AND #{ eDate } )
AND S.useYn = #{ useYn }
AND S.title LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{ searchWrd }, '%' )
ORDER BY S.seq ) T ORDER BY rowNo DESC LIMIT #{sizePerPage} OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 1
